mapper.select: update INSBQuoteconfig set operator = #{operator},modifytime = #{modifytime},noti = #{noti},agreementid = #{agreementid},autorulequote = #{autorulequote},autojinglingquote = #{autojinglingquote},autoediquote = #{autoediquote},manualrecord = #{manualrecord},manuarulelrecord = #{manuarulelrecord},manualadjust = #{manualadjust} where id = #{id}
